text:
A detailed listing of the ports on the ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 (Intel) chassis and their corresponding numbers in the image:
1. USB 2.0 
2. Ethernet (RJ-45) 
3. Kensington Nano Security Slot 
4. USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 
5. Thunderbolt 4 
6. USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On) 
7. HDMI 
8. Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm) 
Standard Ports (Full List with Specifications):
1x USB 2.0 
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On) 
1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.4) 
1x Thunderbolt™ 4/USB4 40Gbps (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.4) 
1x HDMI 2.1, up to 4K/60Hz 
1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm) 
1x Ethernet (RJ-45) 
The transfer speed of these ports will vary depending on factors like the host device's processing speed and file attributes, and may be slower than the theoretical speed. Theoretical maximum speeds are: USB 2.0: 480 Mbit/s; USB 3.2 Gen 1: 5 Gbit/s; USB 3.2 Gen 2: 10 Gbit/s; USB4 40Gbps / Thunderbolt™ 3/4: 40 Gbit/s.

Processor Family: 13th Generation Intel U, P or H Series Core i3/i5/i7 Processor. The table below provides the full processor specifications. Note: Intel Iris Xe Graphics capability requires the system to be configured with dual-channel memory; on a system with single-channel memory, it will function as Intel UHD Graphics.
Core i3-1315U: 6 Cores (2 P-core + 4 E-core), 8 Threads, P-core Base 1.2GHz / E-core Base 0.9GHz, P-core Max 4.5GHz / E-core Max 3.3GHz, 10MB Cache, Intel UHD Graphics
Core i5-13350: 10 Cores (2 P-core + 8 E-core), 12 Threads, P-core Base 1.3GHz / E-core Base 0.9GHz, P-core Max 4.6GHz / E-core Max 3.4GHz, 12MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i5-1340P: 12 Cores (4 P-core + 8 E-core), 16 Threads, P-core Base 1.9GHz / E-core Base 1.4GHz, P-core Max 4.6GHz / E-core Max 3.4GHz, 12MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i5-13420H: 8 Cores (4 P-core + 4 E-core), 12 Threads, P-core Base 2.1GHz / E-core Base 1.5GHz, P-core Max 4.6GHz / E-core Max 3.4GHz, 12MB Cache, Intel UHD Graphics
Core i5-1345U: 10 Cores (2 P-core + 8 E-core), 12 Threads, P-core Base 1.6GHz / E-core Base 1.2GHz, P-core Max 4.7GHz / E-core Max 3.5GHz, 12MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i5-13500H: 12 Cores (4 P-core + 8 E-core), 16 Threads, P-core Base 2.6GHz / E-core Base 1.9GHz, P-core Max 4.7GHz / E-core Max 3.5GHz, 18MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i7-1355U: 10 Cores (2 P-core + 8 E-core), 12 Threads, P-core Base 1.7GHz / E-core Base 1.2GHz, P-core Max 5.0GHz / E-core Max 3.7GHz, 12MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i7-1360P: 12 Cores (4 P-core + 8 E-core), 16 Threads, P-core Base 2.2GHz / E-core Base 1.6GHz, P-core Max 5.0GHz / E-core Max 3.7GHz, 18MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i7-1365U: 10 Cores (2 P-core + 8 E-core), 12 Threads, P-core Base 1.8GHz / E-core Base 1.3GHz, P-core Max 5.2GHz / E-core Max 3.9GHz, 12MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Core i7-13700H: 14 Cores (6 P-core + 8 E-core), 20 Threads, P-core Base 2.4GHz / E-core Base 1.8GHz, P-core Max 5.0GHz / E-core Max 3.7GHz, 24MB Cache, Intel Iris Xe Graphics

Available operating system options are: Windows 11 Pro , Windows 11 Home , Windows 11 Home Single Language , Windows 11 DG Windows 10 Pro 64 (for special bid only) , Ubuntu Linux (some features may not be supported) , or No preload operating system.
The system includes one of the following graphics options. Note: Intel Iris Xe Graphics requires dual-channel memory; otherwise, it functions as Intel UHD Graphics.
Intel UHD Graphics: Integrated, Shared Memory, Share CPU TDP, DirectX® 12.1
Intel Iris Xe Graphics: Integrated, Shared Memory, Share CPU TDP, DirectX® 12.1
NVIDIA GeForce MX550: Discrete, 2GB GDDR6 Memory, DirectX® 12

Supports up to 4 independent displays (native display and 3 external monitors) via HDMI, USB-C, and Thunderbolt™ .
- HDMI supports up to $4096\times2160@60$Hz 
- USB-C supports up to $4096\times2160@60$Hz 
- Thunderbolt™ supports up to $5120\times2880@60$Hz
Intel SoC (System on Chip) platform.
Memory Type: DDR4-3200. The system has one memory soldered to the systemboard and one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot, making it dual-channel capable.
Maximum Memory: Up to 40GB (8GB soldered + 32GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200
Maximum Memory: Up to 48GB (16GB soldered + 32GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200 (48GB is to test technical readiness; available memory to sell will vary)

Max Storage Support: Up to two drives, 2x M.2 SSD , with M.2 2242 SSD up to 1TB each .
Storage Slots: Two M.2 slots : One M.2 2242 PCIe 3.0 x4 slot  and one M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0 x4 slot. An M.2 PCIe 4.0 x4 SSD in the M.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 slot is downgraded to PCIe 3.0 x4 performance.
M.2 2242 SSD: PCIe NVMe, PCIe 3.0 x4 interface, 128GB offering
M.2 2242 SSD: PCIe NVMe, PCIe 4.0 x4 interface, 256GB/512GB/1TB offering, Opal 2.0 Security
Card Reader: No card reader.

Audio Chip: High Definition (HD) Audio, Synaptic CX11880 codec .
Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, Dolby Atmos .
Microphone: Dual-microphone array, Dolby Voice.
Camera Option: HD 720p, with privacy shutter, fixed focus
Camera Option: FHD 1080p + IR hybrid, with privacy shutter, fixed focus
Camera Option: FHD 1080p, with privacy shutter, fixed focus

Battery Options: 47Wh or 57Wh Rechargeable Li-ion Battery, both support Rapid Charge (charge up to 80% in 1hr). Rapid charge is only guaranteed when the computer is turned off, in standby, or in hibernation mode .
Power Adapter: 65W USB-C (2-pin or 3-pin) AC adapter, supports PD 3.0, 100-240V, 50-60Hz.
Configuration 1 (Max Battery Life - WUXGA non-touch, i3-1315U, 8GB DDR4, 57Wh): MobileMark 2018 up to 11.2 hr; MobileMark 25 up to 8.58 hr; JEITA 2.0 up to 15.2 hr; Local video playback up to 13.9 hr
Alternate Configuration 2 (WUXGA touch, i5-1340P, 16GB DDR4, 57Wh): MobileMark 2018 up to 9.16 hr; MobileMark 25 up to 7.6 hr; JEITA 2.0 up to 15.3 hr; Local video playback up to 13.4 hr

Alternate Configuration 3 (2.2K non-touch, i7-1355U, 40GB DDR4, NVIDIA MX550, 57Wh): MobileMark 2018 up to 8.18 hr; MobileMark 25 up to 6.7 hr; JEITA 2.0 up to 14.9 hr; Local video playback up to 13.1 hr
Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90%. Touchscreen: On-cell multi-touch, supports 10-point touch, or Non-touch.
14" WUXGA (1920x1200): Non-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 800:1 Contrast, 45% NTSC, 60Hz, TÜV Low Blue Light (Software)
14" WUXGA (1920x1200): Multi-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 800:1 Contrast, 45% NTSC, 60Hz, TÜV Low Blue Light (Software)
14" 2.2K (2240x1400): Non-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 1500:1 Contrast, 100% SRGB, 60Hz, Eyesafe Certified 2.0

Pen: No support .
Keyboard: 6-row, spill-resistant, multimedia Fn keys with Unified Communications controls .
Keyboard Backlight: LED backlight or Non-backlight options .
UltraNav™: TrackPoint pointing device and Mylar surface multi-touch 3-button Trackpad, $56 \times 115$ mm ($2.24 \times 4.53$ inches).

Dimensions (W x D x H): $313 \times 219.3 \times 17.99$ mm ($12.32 \times 8.63 \times 0.71$ inches) (dimensions may vary depending on configurations) .
Case Color options: Arctic grey and Graphite black.
Case Material: Aluminium (top), PC-ABS (bottom) | Weight: Starting at 1.41 kg (3.11 lbs)
Case Material: Aluminium (top), aluminium (bottom) | Weight: Starting at 1.43 kg (3.15 lbs)

Ethernet: Gigabit Ethernet, Intel Ethernet Connection I219-V, 1x RJ-45, supports Wake-on-LAN .
WWAN: No support .
SIM Card: No physical SIM card inbox .
NFC: No support.
Wi-Fi 6, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1, M.2 card
Realtek Wi-Fi 6 RTL8852BE, 802.11ax Dual Band 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1 (Bluetooth 5.3 hardware ready), M.2 card
Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1 (Bluetooth 5.2 hardware ready), M.2 card
Wi-Fi 6E, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1, M.2 card
Realtek Wi-Fi 6E RTL8852CE, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1 (Bluetooth 5.3 hardware ready), M.2 card
Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1 (Bluetooth 5.3 hardware ready), M.2 card
Various docking solutions supported via Thunderbolt™ or USB-C.
Other Security: ThinkShield, Camera privacy shutter, (Optional) IR camera for Windows Hello (facial recognition).
Security Chip: Firmware TPM 2.0 integrated in SoC or Discrete TPM 2.0, TCG certified, FIPS 140-2 certified
Physical Lock: Kensington Nano Security Slot™, $2.5 \times 6$ mm
Smart Card Reader: No smart card reader
Fingerprint Reader: Touch style fingerprint reader integrated in power button or No fingerprint reader
BIOS Security: NVMe password, Power-on password, Supervisor password, Self-healing BIOS
System management options include Intel vPro Enterprise or Non-vPro.
Base Warranty Options: 1-year mail-in service
Base Warranty Options: 1-year courier or carry-in service
Base Warranty Options: 1-year courier or carry-in with 2-year system board service (Korea only)
Base Warranty Options: 1-year limited onsite service
Base Warranty Options: No base warranty
Lenovo 15.6" laptop casual toploader, polyester, black
None
Maximum altitude (without pressurization): 3048 m (10,000 ft). Note: When charging the battery, its temperature must be no lower than $10^{\circ}C$ $(50^{\circ}F)$.
Operating Temperature: $5^{\circ}C$ $(41^{\circ}F)$ to $35^{\circ}C$ $(95^{\circ}F)$
Storage and transportation in original shipping package: $-20^{\circ}C$ $(-4^{\circ}F)$ to $60^{\circ}C$ $(140^{\circ}F)$
Storage without package: $5^{\circ}C$ $(41^{\circ}F)$ to $43^{\circ}C$ $(109^{\circ}F)$
Operating Relative Humidity: 8% to 95% at wet-bulb temperature $23^{\circ}C$ $(73^{\circ}F)$
Storage and transportation Relative Humidity: 5% to 95% at wet-bulb temperature $27^{\circ}C$ $(81^{\circ}F)$
The system utilizes Post Consumer Content (PCC) recycled plastic in several components and uses low-temperature solder.
25% PCC recycled plastic used in the battery pack enclosure
30% PCC recycled plastic used in speaker enclosure
90% PCC recycled plastic used in standard 65W adapter

Other Certifications: MIL-STD-810H military test passed. (Optional) Eyesafe Certified 2.0. (Optional) TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light (Hardware Solution). (Optional) TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light (Software Solution).
Green Certifications: ENERGY STAR 8.0
Green Certifications: EPEAT™ Gold Registered
Green Certifications: ErP Lot 6/26
Green Certifications: FSC certified package
Green Certifications: RoHS compliant
Green Certifications: TCO Certified 9.0

A detailed listing of the ports on the ThinkPad E14 Gen 5 (AMD) chassis. Standard Ports (Full List with Specifications): 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On), 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer only), 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.4), 1x HDMI 2.1, up to 4K/60Hz, 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Ethernet (RJ-45). The transfer speed of these ports will vary depending on factors like the host device's processing speed and file attributes, and may be slower than the theoretical speed. Theoretical maximum speeds are: USB 2.0: 480 Mbit/s; USB 3.2 Gen 1: 5 Gbit/s; USB 3.2 Gen 2: 10 Gbit/s; USB4 40Gbps / Thunderbolt™ 3/4: 40 Gbit/s.
USB 3.2 Gen 1
Ethernet (RJ-45)
Kensington Nano Security Slot
USB-C 3.2 Gen 1
USB-C 3.2 Gen 2
USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On)
HDMI
Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
Processor Family: AMD Ryzen™ 3 / 5 / 7 Processor. The full processor specifications are detailed below.
AMD Ryzen™ 3 7330U: 4 Cores, 8 Threads, 2.3GHz Base / 4.3GHz Max, 2MB L2 / 8MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 5 5625U: 6 Cores, 12 Threads, 2.3GHz Base / 4.3GHz Max, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 5 7430U: 6 Cores, 12 Threads, 2.3GHz Base / 4.3GHz Max, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 5 7530U: 6 Cores, 12 Threads, 2.0GHz Base / 4.5GHz Max, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
AMD Ryzen™ 7 7730U: 8 Cores, 16 Threads, 2.0GHz Base / 4.5GHz Max, 4MB L2 / 16MB L3 Cache, AMD Radeon™ Graphics
Available operating system options are: Windows® 11 Pro, Windows® 11 Home, Windows® 11 Home Single Language, Windows® 11 DG Windows® 10 Pro 64 (for special bid only), or No preload operating system.
Windows® 11 Pro
Windows® 11 Home
Windows® 11 Home Single Language
Windows® 11 DG Windows® 10 Pro 64 (for special bid only)
No preload operating system
Graphics: AMD Radeon™ Graphics, Integrated, Shared Memory, Share CPU TDP, DirectX® 12.
Supports up to 4 independent displays (native display and 3 external monitors via HDMI® and USB-C®).
HDMI® supports up to $4096\times2160@30$Hz
USB-C® supports up to $5120\times2160@60$Hz
AMD SoC (System on Chip) platform.
Max Memory: Up to 40GB (8GB soldered + 32GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200. Memory Slots: One memory soldered to systemboard, one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot, dual-channel capable. Memory Type: DDR4-3200.
Max Memory: Up to 40GB (8GB soldered + 32GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200
Memory Slots: One memory soldered to systemboard, one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot, dual-channel capable
Memory Type: DDR4-3200

Max Storage Support: Up to two drives, $2\times$ M.2 SSD. Storage Slots: Two M.2 slots: One M.2 2242 PCIe 3.0 x4 slot and one M.2 2280 PCIe 3.0 x4 slot. The M.2 2280 slot supports an M.2 2242 SSD (up to 512GB) or an M.2 2280 SSD (up to 1TB).
M.2 2242 SSD up to 512GB, PCIe NVMe, PCIe 3.0 x4 interface
M.2 2280 SSD up to 1TB, PCIe NVMe, PCIe 3.0 x4 interface
Card Reader: No card reader.
Audio Chip: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC3287 codec. Speakers: Stereo speakers, $2\text{W}\times2$, Dolby Audio™. Microphone: Dual-microphone array, Dolby Voice.
Camera: HD 720p, with privacy shutter, fixed focus
Camera: FHD 1080p, with privacy shutter, fixed focus

Battery Options: Integrated Li-Polymer 47Wh or 57Wh battery, both support Rapid Charge (charge up to 80% in 1hr). Rapid charge is only guaranteed when the computer is turned off, in standby, or in hibernation mode.
Power Adapter: 65W USB-C (2-pin or 3-pin), supports PD 3.0, 100-240V, 50-60Hz.
Battery Life (MobileMark 2018, 57Wh): up to 12.6 hr. (Note: Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.)
Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90%. Touchscreen: On-cell multi-touch, supports 10-point touch, or Non-touch.
14" WUXGA ($1920\times1200$): Non-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 800:1 Contrast, 45% NTSC, 60Hz, TÜV Low Blue Light (Software)
14" WUXGA ($1920\times1200$): Multi-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 800:1 Contrast, 45% NTSC, 60Hz, TÜV Low Blue Light (Software)
14" 2.2K ($2240\times1400$): Non-touch, IPS, 300nits, Anti-glare, 16:10, 1500:1 Contrast, 100% SRGB, 60Hz, Eyesafe Certified 2.0

Keyboard: 6-row, spill-resistant, multimedia Fn keys with Unified Communications controls. UltraNav™: TrackPoint pointing device and Mylar surface multi-touch 3-button Trackpad, $56 \times 115$ mm ($2.24 \times 4.53$ inches).
Keyboard Backlight: LED backlight or Non-backlight options.
WWAN: No support. SIM Card: No physical SIM card inbox. NFC: No support.
Ethernet: Gigabit Ethernet, Realtek RTL8111H-CG, $1\times$ RJ-45, supports Wake-on-LAN.
WLAN + Bluetooth: Wi-Fi 6, 802.11ax $2\times2$ Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1, M.2 card
WLAN + Bluetooth: Wi-Fi 6E, 802.11ax $2\times2$ Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1, M.2 card (Bluetooth 5.3 hardware ready)
WLAN + Bluetooth: Wi-Fi 6E, 802.11ax $2\times2$ Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1, M.2 card
Various docking solutions supported via USB-C®.
Other Security: ThinkShield, Camera privacy shutter, (Optional) IR camera for Windows Hello (facial recognition).
Security Chip: Firmware TPM 2.0 integrated in SoC or Discrete TPM 2.0, TCG certified, FIPS 140-2 certified
Physical Lock: Kensington Nano Security Slot™, $2.5 \times 6$ mm
Smart Card Reader: No smart card reader
Fingerprint Reader: Touch style fingerprint reader integrated in power button or No fingerprint reader
BIOS Security: NVMe password, Power-on password, Supervisor password, Self-healing BIOS

Available Operating Systems: Windows 11 Pro Education¹; Windows 11 Home - HP recommends Windows 11 Pro for business¹; Windows 11 Home Single Language - HP recommends Windows 11 Pro for business¹; Windows 11 Pro (Windows 11 Enterprise or Windows 10 Enterprise available with a Volume Licensing Agreement); Windows 11 Pro (preinstalled with Windows 10 Pro Downgrade) 1,2; FreeDOS.

Processor family: Intel Pentium® processor, 13th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 processor, 13th Generation Intel Core i5 processor, 13th Generation Intel® Core™ i3 processor. The system is available with a variety of 13th Generation Intel Core™ and Pentium U/P series processors.

Intel Core™ i7-1355U (1.2 GHz E-core base frequency, 1.7 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.7 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 5.0 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 12 MB L3 cache, 2 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 12 threads)

Intel Core™ i5-1335U (0.9 GHz E-core base frequency, 1.3 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.4 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.6 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 12 MB L3 cache, 2 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 12 threads)

Intel Core™ i3-1340P with Intel UHD Graphics (0.9 GHz E-core base frequency, 1.2 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.3 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.5 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 10 MB L3 cache, 2 P-cores and 4 E-cores, 6 threads)

Intel Pentium U300 with Intel UHD Graphics (0.9 GHz E-core base frequency, 1.2 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.3 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.4 GHz P-core burst frequency, 8 MB L3 cache, 1 P-core and 4 E-cores, 6 threads)

Intel® Core™ i7-1360P (1.6 GHz E-core base frequency, 2.2 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.7 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 5.0 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 18 MB L3 cache, 4 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 16 threads)

Intel® Core™ i5-1340P (1.4 GHz E-core base frequency, 1.9 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.4 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.6 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 12 MB L3 cache, 4 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 16 threads)

Intel® Core™ i5-1334U (0.9 GHz E-core base frequency, 1.3 GHz P-core base frequency, up to 3.4 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.6 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 12 MB L3 cache, 2 P-cores and 8 E-core, 12 threads)

Maximum memory: 32 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM; (Transfer rates up to 3200 MT/s.); 7 Both slots are accessible/upgradeable by IT or self-maintainers only. Supports dual channel memory. Memory slots: 2 SODIMM.
Internal storage: up to 1 TB PCIe® NVMe™ M.2 SSD TLC8; 128 GB up to 512 GB PCIe® NVMe™ Value SSD8.
